items.title: How to Start a Livestream
items.description: A step-by-step video showing how to set up OBS, cameras, and scheduled YouTube livestreams for SMHS events.

items.title: How to Use the Scoreboard Tool
items.description: Explains how to operate the scoreboard app, load teams, change scores, and push updates to the livestream.

items.title: Camera Setup & Troubleshooting
items.description: Learn how to connect cameras, switch HDMI sources, use the capture keys, and avoid common signal problems.

items.title: Livestream Crew Responsibilities
items.description: Understanding each role: camera operator, switcher, scoreboard, audio, and stream supervisor.

items.title: Uploading Thumbnails & Editing Details
items.description: How to upload event thumbnails to YouTube, edit titles, descriptions, and tags after the stream.
